TRIGGER_INTRO: At the beginning of your end step,
At the beginning of combat on your turn,
CREATURE_TRIGGER: deals combat damage to a player
ACTIVATED_EFFECT: Target creature gains lifelink until end of turn.
Target creature gains vigilance until end of turn.
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

W: lifelink
whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
whenever you gain life, this creature gains vigilance until end of turn.
whenever you gain life, this creature gains flying until end of turn.
whenever you gain life, this creature gains indestructible until end of turn.
whenever you gain life, scry 1.
whenever you gain life, you may tap up to one target creature.
whenever you gain life, untap this creature.
whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life and this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
whenever another creature you control gains lifelink, you gain 1 life.
whenever one or more other creatures you control attack, you gain 1 life.
whenever this creature attacks, you gain 1 life for each other attacking creature.
whenever this creature attacks, you gain 1 life, then put a +1/+1 counter on this creature if you gained 3 or more life this turn.
whenever this creature blocks, you gain 2 life.
whenever this creature becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.
whenever this creature becomes untapped, you gain 1 life.
whenever this creature deals combat damage, you gain that much life.
whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you gain that much life and create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
whenever you gain life for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
whenever you gain life for the second time each turn, draw a card.
whenever you gain 3 or more life at once, create a 1/1 white Cleric creature token.
whenever you gain 5 or more life at once, you may return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
whenever your total life gained this turn becomes 5 or more, this creature gets +2/+2 and gains vigilance until end of turn.
whenever your total life gained this turn becomes 10 or more, this creature gets +4/+4 and gains flying until end of turn.
whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
whenever you gain life, up to one target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn.
whenever you gain life, up to one target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
whenever an opponent attacks you or a planeswalker you control, you gain 1 life.
whenever a creature you control dies, you gain 1 life.
whenever a creature you control with lifelink dies, you gain life equal to its power.
at the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
at the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
at the beginning of your end step, if you gained 5 or more life this turn, you gain 5 life.
at the beginning of combat on your turn, if you gained life this turn, this creature gets +2/+2 and gains vigilance until end of turn.
as long as you have 25 or more life, this creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
as long as you have more life than each opponent, creatures you control have lifelink.
as long as you’ve gained life this turn, this creature has first strike.
whenever you gain life, you may exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control.
U: whenever you gain life, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
whenever you gain 3 or more life at once, draw a card.
whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature if you have more cards in hand than each opponent.
whenever you gain life, tap up to one target creature an opponent controls.
whenever you gain life, you may return target creature you control to its owner’s hand.
whenever you gain life, this creature can’t be blocked this turn except by creatures with flying.
at the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, you may phase out this creature.
as long as you’ve gained life this turn, this creature has hexproof.
B: whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
whenever you gain life, you may pay 1 life. If you do, draw a card.
whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and lose 1 life.
whenever you gain life, each opponent mills two cards.
whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you gain 1 life.
whenever a creature you control dies, you gain 1 life and each opponent loses 1 life.
whenever you gain 3 or more life at once, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
whenever an opponent loses life, you gain 1 life.
at the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, create a 1/1 black Spirit creature token with flying.
whenever you gain life, you may return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
whenever you gain life, if an opponent has 10 or less life, put two +1/+1 counters on this creature.
as long as you have 30 or more life, this creature has menace and deathtouch.
whenever you gain life, you may exile target card from a graveyard.
whenever you gain life, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
whenever you gain life, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, draw a card.
R: whenever you gain life, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
whenever you gain life, this creature gains first strike until end of turn.
whenever you gain life, this creature gains menace until end of turn.
whenever you gain 3 or more life at once, this creature deals 2 damage to any target.
whenever you gain life, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
whenever you gain life, create a 1/1 red Warrior creature token that can’t block.
whenever you gain life, if this is the second time this turn you’ve gained life, this creature gains double strike until end of turn.
whenever you gain life during combat, untap this creature.
whenever you gain life, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, this creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
G: whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.
whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target land you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature that’s still a land.
whenever you gain life, untap target creature you control.
whenever you gain life, untap target land you control.
whenever you gain 3 or more life at once, create a 2/2 green Beast creature token.
whenever you gain 4 or more life at once, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token with trample.
whenever you gain life, this creature gains trample until end of turn.
whenever you gain life, this creature gains hexproof until end of turn.
whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life and that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
whenever another creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, you gain life equal to its toughness.
at the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with lifelink.
as long as you have 25 or more life, creatures you control get +1/+1.
whenever you gain life, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
whenever you gain life, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
whenever you gain life, you may have target creature you control fight up to one target creature you don’t control.
whenever you gain life, if this is the third time this turn you’ve gained life, create a 4/4 green Elemental creature token with trample.
whenever you gain life, you may distribute that many +1/+1 counters among any number of other target creatures you control.

whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, remove all of them and create a {X}/{X} green Elemental creature token, where X is the number of counters removed this way.
C: whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
whenever you gain life, you may have target opponent lose 1 life.
whenever you gain life, if your life total is 40 or more, you win the game.
